name: Coral Caper
description:
Welcome to Coral Caper, the thrilling shark-scrolling running game! In this game, you play as a fierce shark and your objective is to eat as many fish as you can while avoiding the attacks of human enemies. You can earn points by collecting small fish and shooting enemies with bullets that you can fire by pressing the space bar. You can also control the height of your shark by pressing the up and down arrows on your keyboard.

The game takes place in a beautiful underwater world full of vibrant coral reefs, colorful fish, and dangerous human enemies. As you swim through the levels, you'll encounter different challenges and obstacles that will test your skills and reflexes. You'll need to be quick and agile to avoid the traps and enemies that are lurking in the depths of the ocean.

With its fast-paced gameplay, stunning graphics, and addictive soundtrack, Coral Caper is sure to keep you hooked for hours. So put on your scuba gear and get ready to dive into the world of Coral Caper!
